participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and resilient, always up for a challenge and loves to push boundaries.
participant_1.background: i am a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, with a love for creativity and making new friends.
participant_2.background: mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i am in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen.
